text: The French have blind trust in #Raoult who said #chloroquine would save lives in the current #COVID19 crisis. Problem is: he faked the data, published it in a journal he himself controls. He's a climate change denier & known for sexual harrassment. But he's worshipped like God 🤦🏽‍♀️ https://t.co/DQqN0sY7Kl
